Zaitun Driwaru (amụrụ na 10 Disemba na afo 1977), bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti maka Yumbe District, na 10th Uganda Parliament (2016 - 2021).
A mụrụ Driwaru na 10 Disemba na afo 1977
Ọ gara Arua Hill Primary School, n'obodo Arua, nnukwu obodo ukwu na mpaghara West Nile
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ na afo 1991 wee banye na Mvara Secondary School kwa na Arua
O nwetara ma Uganda Certificate of Education (O-Level) na Uganda Advanced Certificate of education (A-Level), na afo 1995 na 1999, n'otu n'otu.
A nabatara ya na Muni National Teachers College, ebe e nyere ya diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị, n'afọ 2002
N'afọ 2005, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Islam dị na Uganda, na nzere Bachelor of Public Administration.
Site na afo 1999 ruo na afo 2001, ọ bụ onye njikwa ahịa na Bata Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Aringa Secondary School, n'obodo Yumbe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmepe obodo maka Gọọmentị Obodo Yumbe, site na afo 2006 ruo na afo 2011.
N'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2016, Zaitun Driwaru sonyere maka oche onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti maka Yumbe District
Ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya
Driwaru meriri Avako Naima Gule, nke National Resistance Movement na-achị, onye bụ onye omeiwu nọ n'ọkwa n'oge ahụ

Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri, ọ na-eje ozi na kọmitii na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ na egwuregwu na kọmiti na-ahụ Maka mmesi obi ike gọọmentị. Ọ bụkwa onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA). Zaitun Driwaru bụ onye otu zuru oke nke ntọala nke Uganda Muslim Supreme Council (UMSC).
